title: Executive Order 7703-Designation of Jeanne Kavanagh To Sign Land Patents
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 450 of the Revised Statutes, as amended (U.S.C., title 43, sec. 8), Jeanne Kavanagh of Iowa, appointed by the Secretary of the Interior August 24, 1937, to the position of clerk to sign land patents, is hereby designated to sign my name to said patents.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7703-Designation of Jeanne Kavanagh To Sign Land Patents Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371753
